title: Definitions
context: [ยง107D-1] Definitions. As used in this chapter: &ldquo;Building lease&rdquo; means a contract between the department and private investor in which the private investor conveys an improved facility to the department for a specified period of time. &ldquo;Department&rdquo; means the department of accounting and general services. &ldquo;Development agreement&rdquo; means an agreement between the State and a private investor which, at a minimum, includes: (1) A description of the work to be done; (2) The sale price for the facility; (3) The duration of the agreement; (4) The roles and responsibilities of the department and the private investor; and (5) The terms and conditions for the ground lease and building lease. &ldquo;Facility&rdquo; means property under the management and control of the department that may contain land, buildings, or both. &ldquo;Ground lease&rdquo; means a lease of land executed between the State and private investor pursuant to which the private investor will renovate the existing facility, provide improvements, or construct a new building or buildings on a specified property. &ldquo;Private investor&rdquo; means a non-governmental entity. [L 2011, c 231, pt of ยง2]
